name: NewsBlur - Kemwer Black
description:
A dark theme for NewsBlur.

No structural changes made to website, it's a pure color theme. A couple of images were remade for dark backgrounds and embedded on the CSS as Base64 code. I also removed a few instances of shadow and gradient effects when I found them to not work as well, or just when I thought it would work better without.

The CSS code is a bit messy and could use some cleanup and reorganization since I wrote it directly on the Stylish editor. I'll work on cleaning it up once I have a final version. Consider this a beta version, and please report any problems.
additional_info:
2013-07-30: 0.1.4 Bugfix
  + Style for folder title
2013-07-09: 0.1.3 Bugfix
  + Style for "Fetching" and "Fetching Error" messages
2013-07-06: 0.1.2 Bugfix
  + Style for "Recommended Site" date.
  + Style for new user tooltip
  + Style for "Getting Started" Hide link (kept original style for content, since users really should take notice of that, and it's never shown again).
2013-06-22: 0.1.1 Bugfix
  + Fixed compatibility with Firefox
  + Added code to change scrollbar colors on Webkit-based browsers. No alternative available on Firefox.
2013-04-19: 0.1.0 Initial release.

discussions.name: Beautiful design. Thank you! Just one caveat...
